bdb.gurmukhi: pu`qr, iesqrI, imqr Aqy swQI Awid ivcoN koeI vI AMq-kwl vyly qyry nwl nhIN jweygw।

en.bdb: Your sons, your wife, all of them will call you a ghodt.”162.
